other_tests.procedure_name: Ultrasound-guided percutaneous placement of a cholecystostomy catheter
other_tests.findings: The gallbladder is severely distended to 5 x 10 cm and filled with echogenic sludge and debris. There is no definite gallbladder wall thickening, edema or pericholecystic fluid. Mild intrahepatic biliary dilatation. Tenderness over the gallbladder.
